title: Macquarie Picks: Stock ideas with upside potential of 20% to 58.7%
description: Macquarie has recommended top stock ideas from a six-month to three year timeframe. The target prices imply upsides of 20% to 58.7% from the closing prices on Wednesday.
excerpt: Macquarie has recommended top stock ideas from a six-month to three year timeframe. The target prices imply upsides of 20% to 58.7% from the closing prices on Wednesday.
